task.title: Searching the full text
task.shortdesc: The search box is autocomplete-enabled. If you don't use that function (e.g. you continue to type your word or phrase without selecting a term from the drop down list) your search may not work if it has a spelling error, an extra space, or any other form of discrepancy with the tags and terms as they have been encoded into the document.

context.p: If you have selected a chapter from the Table of Contents, your search will only be conducted within that chapter. If you would like to conduct a full text search make sure that none of the chapters, sections, or articles are selected.

step.cmd: Type in the word(s) that you are searching for.
DToC displays the location of the word you are looking for in the Table of Contents and the Document Model.
To restart your search choose the “Clear” button located at the top of the Document Model.
